title: A Non-Trinitarian Amidst Evangelicals, The Value of Propositional Belief
description:
Sam reached out to me with his interesting case study. In the meaning conversations I've been pondering the place and value of propositional belief over and against lived out belief. The Trinity is deeply foundational to orthodox Christianity but do even conservative churches today have a felt sense of how it functions in the life of the church? Sam's case illustrates that question. 

Athansian Creed https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athanasian_Creed

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discordapp.com/invite/pmQuHSW (Discord Server) (this updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work. 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

There is a video version of this podcast on YouTube at http://www.youtube.com/paulvanderklay

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
